```{r}

x <- c(1, 2, 3)
y <- x

obj_addr(x)
obj_addr(y)

obj_addr(x)== obj_addr(y)
```

```{r exec 1}

a <- 1:10
b <- a
c <- b
d <- 1:10

obj_addr(a) == obj_addr(b)
obj_addr(b) == obj_addr(c) 
obj_addr(c) != obj_addr(d) 

```

```{r exec 2}

obj_addr(mean)
obj_addr(base::mean)
obj_addr(get("mean"))
obj_addr(evalq(mean))
obj_addr(match.fun("mean"))
obj_addr(match.fun(`mean`))

```
